scripts.data:download: rm -rf download/ontime.tar && wget https://clickhouse-datasets.s3.yandex.net/ontime/partitions/ontime.tar && mv ontime.tar download
scripts.backup:create:server1: docker run --rm --name clickhouse-create-backup1 --network host -v $PWD/clickhouse_db_vol1:/var/lib/clickhouse -e CLICKHOUSE_DATA_PATH=/var/lib/clickhouse -e CLICKHOUSE_HOST=localhost -e CLICKHOUSE_PORT=9000 -p 8123:8123 -p 9000:9000 alexakulov/clickhouse-backup create "my_backup_$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H-%M-%S)"
scripts.backup:clean:server1: docker run --rm --name clickhouse-create-backup1 --network host -v $PWD/clickhouse_db_vol1:/var/lib/clickhouse -e CLICKHOUSE_DATA_PATH=/var/lib/clickhouse -e CLICKHOUSE_HOST=localhost -e CLICKHOUSE_PORT=9000 -p 8123:8123 -p 9000:9000 alexakulov/clickhouse-backup clean
scripts.backup:ls:server1: docker run --rm --network host -v $PWD/clickhouse_db_vol1:/var/lib/clickhouse -e CLICKHOUSE_DATA_PATH=/var/lib/clickhouse -e CLICKHOUSE_HOST=localhost -e CLICKHOUSE_PORT=9000 -p 8123:8123 -p 9000:9000 alexakulov/clickhouse-backup list
